review: She is very friendly and amazing doctor. I am fully satisfied with Dr seema. She explained me about baby care very nicely ,Dr.  should be like her very calm and friendly.

**** *********** *** *** ********* ********** Not at all flexible or child friendly. Has her own set of views *** ******* **** **** *********** ** ********* and would never bend it for the patient's sake. Not open to new ideas or bothered to understand patient's point of view.

When the baby is crying even before giving the injection , the doctor should 1st attend the baby and then type her notes on the computer. Baby cried and cried while waiting for the doctor to finish her notes and prick the baby. I will never recommend this doctor to anyone unless she changes this behaviour
